awd_titl_txt: CISE Research Instrumentation:  Real-Time Planning and      Control for Cooperative Manipulators in the Virginia Tech   AI/Robotics Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: This award is to purchase high-speed workstations, high-                   resolution cameras, digitizers, and actuator-control                            equipment to enhance an existing pair of industrial-quality                     robot arms.  The equipment will support research projects in                    real-time collision avoidance, integration of stereo range                      estimation and cooperative manipulation, planning for real-                     time control in real environments, and planning and                             simulation.                                                                                                                                                     Virginia Polytechnic Institute will purchase equipment to                       support several research projects in the area of real-time                      control of robotic manipulation tasks.  The research will                       center on the cooperative use of artificial intelligence                        techniques, machine vision, efficient world models, and                         hierarchical design for robust planning and control.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
